## hpr0663 :: What is on your mp3 player

 errata and clarifications

I use hpodder to catch podcasts.  Great podcast client for hackers IMO; Easy to script and make it do what you want.  I run it from a cronjob nightly.

links

Planet Money: https://goo.gl/KC7Fb
rockbox: https://www.rockbox.org/
hpodder: https://jgoerzen.github.com/hpodder/
hpodder documentation: https://goo.gl/lTAyc
Super Mono BT to redirect audio on Android: https://goo.gl/LYdZ4
Cyanogenmod: https://goo.gl/fUQ4
